title: Test Lead
description: Oversaw quality and testing practices on a feature team. Helped delivery feature from concept to first beta users.
stack: AWS, Angular, Protractor, Typescript, Runscope, Azure DevOps, Python, Locust, MSSQL
items: Collaborated to get existing broken test suite running in continuos integration/deployment pipeline
Converted existing protractor tests to accept parameterization for testing feature
Researched and evaluated testing solutions for API contract and load testing
Implemented contract testing for third party API required for feature
Provided cross team quality and testing coaching

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: R&D feature team focused delivering ag data applications
stack: AWS, Java, Spring Boot, React, Scala, Python, Jenkins
items: Developed and tested applications
Deployed and maintained AWS infrastructure
Helped drive team towards full cross functionality where development, testing, ops are tasks not roles
Acted as the team's test lead
Provided insight to risk mitigation, testing concerns
Provided quality and testing coaching to the team through pairing and katas
Cross team quality and testing coaching
Provided coaching around javascript, node, React and general web technologies
Developed testing tools and processes for the team
Creating and maintaining swagger documents for feature APIs
Participated in team's on-call rotation

title: Software Engineer
description: Built an evergreen QA automation team/practice. Leading those efforts through a subcommittee developing our technology stack, processes, documentation & best practices. I was also the lead QA engineer for my business channel as well as rotating scrum master for channels.
items: Managing multiple remote resources work and output
Created library for validating PDFs against a reference document written in Python

Created a extensible test framework for Selenium tests written in Python. This provides parallel test execution, parameterized tests, webdriver management, page object integration, screenshots, plugins, junit/html reporting, coupling automation to assertions for better reporting and declarative test definitions
Created a parser/validator for DTCC standard data formats (POV, COM, FAR) and test suite to validator generated DTCC files
Created an automation suite to consume declarative style data files and drive data input automation for Trilogy's DCM application
Implemented roles based security testing using selenium automation

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for implementing system acceptance testing using Protractor across multiple applications.
items: Completed backlog of test automation
Decreased test code compilation time from 20 minutes to 10 seconds
Integrated protractor tests in to continuos integration/deployment pipeline
Increased integration to development cycle by pushing for the automation team to attend development meetings
Implemented load and stress testing of the API using JMeter
Created application for taking telemetry data and generating JMeter test plans
Refactored large portions of the testing code base including page objects, test data retrieval, logging and test result reporting
Overhauled how test data is defined and populated for tests by creating a standardized conventions

title: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for implementing system acceptance tests for a cross platform mobile application developed with Xamarin
items: Implemented system acceptance testing for a cross platform mobile application developed with Xamarin
Created application for visualizing spatiotemporal data onto map

title: Quality Engineer
description: Responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining system acceptance testing across multiple applications/environments.
stack: AWS, Ruby, Ruby On Rails, Webdriver, RSpec, Jenkins
items: Moved company from manual QA processes to automated giving us better test coverage, faster deploys and more time for QAs to perform exploratory testing
Implemented system acceptance testing using Selenium
Implemented continuous integration deployment pipeline in Jenkins
Implemented end to end and integration testing of internal/external APIs
Implemented stress testing of applications and APIs using JMeter
Implemented unit tests for existing untested code
Implemented cross validation of the classification engine using a k-fold cross validation
Created application for text scraping web sites using a rule system based on url pattern matching
Created application to filter a high throughput data stream using naive bayesian classification and set logic
